REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2173 reute d f BC-EPSCO-<EPSC.O>-GETS-R 06-01 0045

TEXT.TITLE: EPSCO <EPSC.O> GETS RAYTHEON <RTN> CONTRACTS
TEXT.BODY: EPSCO Inc said it has receiveed contracts worth 2,800,000 dlrs from Raytheon Co for high-powered microwave components and antenna feed subsystems for use on the Patriot air defense missile system. Reuter
